rows.label: qst001801_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh goodness, thank you.
You really saved me!

rows.label: qst001801_msg0002
rows.name:
My name is Olua. You can probably
tell I'm a Blade. Nice to meet you!

rows.label: qst001801_msg0003
rows.name: What should we say to her?

rows.label: qst001801_msg0004
rows.name: Invite her to join us

rows.label: qst001801_msg0005
rows.name: Ask what happened to her Driver

rows.label: qst001801_msg0006
rows.name: I'm awfully sorry.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm in your debt, but I
can't join you.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0008
rows.name: I have a wonderful Driver named Romney.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0009
rows.name: Ah, you noticed.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0010
rows.name:
My Driver is a wonderful
young man named Romney.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0011
rows.name:
He is still a novice Driver,
not yet as strong as you.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0012
rows.name:
Nor is he much of a
swordsman yet.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0013
rows.name:
So when faced with danger, he
tends to run away.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0014
rows.name:
But a Moks Eluca caught him unawares
from behind, and sent him tumbling
down into the Cloud Sea.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0015
rows.name:
Don't worry.
Everything's fine!

rows.label: qst001801_msg0016
rows.name: I'm still alive so he must be too.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0017
rows.name: ...I'd be lying if I said I wasn't worried.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0018
rows.name:
Do you think you'd be able to
perhaps look for Romney?

rows.label: qst001801_msg0019
rows.name:
He might be fine right now,
but if he got attacked by a monster
he'd be a sitting duck.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0020
rows.name: Thank you.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0021
rows.name:
There's a chance that Romney may
return under his own steam, so
I'll wait here in case he does.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0101
rows.name:
Romney fell into the Cloud Sea, so
I'd start looking under this island.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0102
rows.name:
I pray he managed to reach
one of the islands...

rows.label: qst001801_msg0103
rows.name:
Of course he's all right.
Romney is a strong Superbian boy.
Good luck on your search!

rows.label: qst001801_msg0201
rows.name: Help me!

rows.label: qst001801_msg0202
rows.name: Defeat those Moks Elucas! Please!
